details.problem: Although not yet critical, the battery charge is abnormally low (5 %).
details.consequence: A low charge battery may lead to data loss in case of a power outage.
details.recommendedAction: Check why the battery is not fully charged (it may be due to a power outage or an unplugged power cable) and fully recharge the battery when possible.

details.problem: The battery charge is very low and will soon run out of charge (5 %).
details.consequence: A low charge battery may lead to data loss in case of a power outage.
details.recommendedAction: Check why the battery is not fully charged (it may be due to a power outage or an unplugged power cable) and fully recharge the battery when possible.

details.problem: This battery has failed.
details.consequence: This battery is nonoperational and a power outage will certainly lead to data loss and/or corruption.
details.recommendedAction: Replace the battery.

details.problem: Although not yet critical, the battery charge is abnormally low (50 %).
details.consequence: A low charge battery may lead to data loss in case of a power outage.
details.recommendedAction: Check why the battery is not fully charged (it may be due to a power outage or an unplugged power cable) and fully recharge the battery when possible.

details.problem: This battery is degraded.
details.consequence: Check that number of allowed recharges has not been exceeded and that the current full charge capacity (FCC) is close to the full charge capacity of initial battery.
details.recommendedAction: The battery needs to be replaced or reconditioned.

details.problem: This blade has failed.
details.consequence: If this blade is part of a distributed server farm, it may be unable to handle the load and probably affects the performance of other blades.
details.recommendedAction: Check why this blade is not working and try to bring it online. Otherwise, try distributing the load to other blades.

testReport.name: testReport
testReport.value:
Received Result: Criteria testing. OSCommand test succeeded:
- CommandLine: echo Criteria testing
- ExecuteLocally: false
- ExpectedResult: Criteria

Result: Criteria testing
Conclusion: TEST on localhost SUCCEEDED

metadata.description: This connector provides super power connector.

details.problem: The processor encountered and fixed a few internal errors (5).
details.consequence: The stability of the system may be affected. A system crash is likely to occur soon.
details.recommendedAction: Check as soon as possible whether the processor environment is normal (voltage levels and temperature). If so, the processor may be defective and needs to be replaced quickly.

details.problem: The processor encountered and fixed a few internal errors (10).
details.consequence: The stability of the system may be affected. A system crash is likely to occur soon.
details.recommendedAction: Check as soon as possible whether the processor environment is normal (voltage levels and temperature). If so, the processor may be defective and needs to be replaced quickly.

details.problem: An imminent failure is predicted for this processor.
details.consequence: A system crash is very likely to occur soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this processor or disable it as soon as possible, if disabling it will not affect the performance of the system.

details.problem: This processor has failed.
details.consequence: This processor is not operational. This will impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail this processor may crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this processor as soon as possible to prevent a system overload.

details.problem: The processor encountered and fixed a few internal errors (15).
details.consequence: The stability of the system may be affected. A system crash is likely to occur soon.
details.recommendedAction: Check as soon as possible whether the processor environment is normal (voltage levels and temperature). If so, the processor may be defective and needs to be replaced quickly.

details.problem: This processor is degraded or is about to fail.
details.consequence: If degraded, this processor may not be fully operational. This could adversely impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail, this processor is likely to crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this processor as soon as possible to prevent a system crash.

details.problem: This processor core is degraded or is about to fail.
details.consequence: If degraded, this processor core may not be fully operational. This could adversely impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail, this processor core is likely to crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: If possible, disable this processor core as soon as possible to prevent a system crash. Consider replacing the entire physical processor.

details.problem: This processor core has failed.
details.consequence: This processor core is not operational. This will impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail this processor may crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: Disable this processor core if possible and consider replacing the corresponding physical processor as soon as possible to prevent a system overload.

details.problem: This processor core has failed.
details.consequence: This processor core is not operational. This will impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail this processor may crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: Disable this processor core if possible and consider replacing the corresponding physical processor as soon as possible to prevent a system overload.

details.problem: This processor core is degraded or is about to fail.
details.consequence: If degraded, this processor core may not be fully operational. This could adversely impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail, this processor core is likely to crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: If possible, disable this processor core as soon as possible to prevent a system crash. Consider replacing the entire physical processor.

details.problem: The battery of this disk controller is degraded.
details.consequence: A degraded battery in a disk controller with write cache enabled means that a power outage will certainly lead to data loss and/or corruption.
details.recommendedAction: Replace the battery of this disk controller to avoid potential data loss and/or corruption.

details.problem: This disk controller has failed.
details.consequence: This disk controller is no longer working. Its attached disks are probably no longer available to the operating system which means data loss or even corruption.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this disk controller immediately to have a chance to recover the data on the attached disks.

metadata.additionalinformation1: Manufacturer: BIG - Spare Part Number: F5-D106 - Product Number: D106 - Alternative Serial Number: f5-iryj-vgrt
metadata.identifyingInformation: Manufacturer: BIG - Spare Part Number: F5-D106 - Product Number: D106 - Alternative Serial Number: f5-iryj-vgrt

details.problem: The battery of this disk controller has failed.
details.consequence: A failed battery in a disk controller with write cache enabled, means that a power outage will certainly lead to data loss and/or corruption.
details.recommendedAction: Replace the battery of this disk controller to avoid potential data loss and/or corruption.

details.problem: This disk controller is degraded or about to fail.
details.consequence: A degraded disk controller could have a serious performance impact on its attached disks. A controller about to fail means that its attached disks will no longer be available to the operating system. This may lead to data loss and/or corruption.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this disk controller as soon as possible to avoid performance issues and possible data loss and corruption.

metadata.additionalinformation1: Machine ID: 00F6BA5A4C00 System ID: 8000121245100000 LPAR System ID: 8000121245100002
metadata.identifyingInformation: Machine ID: 00F6BA5A4C00 System ID: 8000121245100000 LPAR System ID: 8000121245100002

details.problem: The speed of this fan is out of normal range (5 % of maximum speed).
details.consequence: The fan is not behaving as expected and probably not properly cooling down the system. This could lead to severe hardware damage and system crashes.
details.recommendedAction: Check if the fan is not working as expected. If so, replace the fan.

details.problem: An imminent failure is predicted for this GPU.
details.consequence: A system crash is very likely to occur soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this GPU or disable it as soon as possible, if disabling it will not affect the performance of the system.

details.problem: This GPU has failed.
details.consequence: This GPU is not operational. This will impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail this GPU may crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this GPU as soon as possible to prevent a system overload.

details.problem: The GPU memory utilization is outside of expected range (1000 %).
details.consequence: The memory utilization may not be optimal and therefore lead to lower system performance.
details.recommendedAction: Check why this GPU memory is used so much.

details.problem: The GPU memory utilization is outside of tolerated range (1000 %).
details.consequence: The memory utilization may not be optimal and therefore lead to lower system performance.
details.recommendedAction: Check why this GPU memory utilization is used so much.

details.problem: This GPU is degraded or is about to fail.
details.consequence: If degraded, this GPU may not be fully operational. This could adversely impact the overall performance of the system. If it is about to fail, this GPU is likely to crash very soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this GPU as soon as possible to prevent a system crash.

details.problem: This LED reports a degraded state.
details.consequence: This may lead to a system crash or damaged hardware.
details.recommendedAction: Check the hardware component for any visible problem and replace it if necessary.

details.problem: This LED reports a failed state.
details.consequence: This may lead to a system crash or damaged hardware.
details.recommendedAction: Replace or repair the faulty hardware component.

details.problem: This LED reports a degraded state.
details.consequence: This may lead to a system crash or damaged hardware.
details.recommendedAction: Check the hardware component for any visible problem and replace it if necessary.

details.problem: This LUN is in critical state.
details.consequence: One or more filesystems are no longer available (possible data loss).
details.recommendedAction: Verify the status of the underlying HBA and its connectivity. Verify the reachability of the storage system and whether any configuration change has been made to the corresponding storage volume.

details.problem: The LUN cannot be accessed anymore because no path is available.
details.consequence: One or more filesystems are no longer available (possible data loss).
details.recommendedAction: Verify on the SAN switches which links are broken (link down, or zone exclusion, etc.). Check the mapping and masking configuration of the corresponding storage volume in the storage system.

details.problem: This memory module is degraded or about to fail.
details.consequence: If degraded, this memory module may not be fully operational and may impact the overall performance of the system. If about to fail, this may soon lead to a system crash or data corruption.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this memory module as soon as possible to prevent a system crash or data corruption.

details.problem: An imminent failure is predicted on this memory module.
details.consequence: A system crash or data corruption is very likely to occur soon.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this memory module as soon as possible to prevent a system crash.

details.problem: This memory module has failed.
details.consequence: This memory module is not operational. This probably impacts the overall performance of the system.
details.recommendedAction: Replace this memory module as soon as possible to prevent a system overload.

details.problem: This power supply is in degraded state, or is about to fail.
details.consequence: If this is the only power supply in the enclosure and it is about to fail, the server is about to be turned off. A degraded power supply may also lead to an unstable power conversion and thus to severe system crashes or hardware damages.
details.recommendedAction: Quickly replace the faulty power supply.

details.problem: The power supply is in a critical state.
details.consequence: A failing power supply will turn off the server soon.
details.recommendedAction: Quickly replace the faulty power supply.

details.problem: These robotics may be mechanically failed or broken.
details.consequence: The tape library may no longer be able to perform backups.
details.recommendedAction: Replace or repair the faulty robotics.

needsCleaning.name: needsCleaning
needsCleaning.unit: { 0 =  OK ; 1 = Cleaning Needed ; 2 = Cleaning Needed Immediately }

state.name: NEEDED
state.unit: { 0 =  OK ; 1 = Cleaning Needed ; 2 = Cleaning Needed Immediately }

metadata.additionalinformation1: Element ID: 500 Fibre Node Name: 500104f00094c3c4 Hardware Version: L29S
metadata.identifyingInformation: Element ID: 500 Fibre Node Name: 500104f00094c3c4 Hardware Version: L29S

details.problem: This tape drives needs to be cleaned. Either the tape drive exceeds internal preset error thresholds in the drive or the tape drive exceeds the maximum recommended time between cleaning.
details.consequence: Regular tape drive cleaning helps in long-term reliability, prevents read/write errors and should be conducted on a scheduled cycle as well as when requested by the drive.
details.recommendedAction: Wait for any running operation to finish, eject the tape and clean the drive.

needsCleaning.name: needsCleaning
needsCleaning.unit: { 0 =  OK ; 1 = Cleaning Needed ; 2 = Cleaning Needed Immediately }

state.name: OK
state.unit: { 0 =  OK ; 1 = Cleaning Needed ; 2 = Cleaning Needed Immediately }

details.problem: This tape drive may be jammed, dirty, mechanically failed or broken.
details.consequence: The tape library may no longer be able to perform backups.
details.recommendedAction: Quickly replace the faulty tape drive.

needsCleaning.name: needsCleaning
needsCleaning.unit: { 0 =  OK ; 1 = Cleaning Needed ; 2 = Cleaning Needed Immediately }

state.name: NEEDED_IMMEDIATELY
state.unit: { 0 =  OK ; 1 = Cleaning Needed ; 2 = Cleaning Needed Immediately }

metadata.additionalinformation1: Element ID: 500 Fibre Node Name: 500104f00094c3c4 Hardware Version: TS2280
metadata.identifyingInformation: Element ID: 500 Fibre Node Name: 500104f00094c3c4 Hardware Version: TS2280

details.problem: This tape drives requires to be cleaned immediately. Either the tape drive exceeds internal preset error thresholds in the drive or the tape drive exceeds the maximum recommended time between cleaning.
details.consequence: Regular tape drive cleaning helps in long-term reliability, prevents read/write errors and should be conducted on a scheduled cycle as well as when requested by the drive.
details.recommendedAction: Wait for any running operation to finish, eject the tape and clean the drive.

details.problem: Although not yet critical, the temperature is abnormally high (98 C).
details.consequence: An out-of-range temperature may lead to a system crash or even damaged hardware.
details.recommendedAction: Check why the temperature is out of the normal range (it may be due to a fan failure, a severe system overload or a failure in the data center cooling system).

details.problem: The temperature is critically high (98 C).
details.consequence: An out-of-range temperature may lead to a system crash or even damaged hardware.
details.recommendedAction: Check why the temperature is out of the normal range (it may be due to a fan failure, a severe system overload or a failure in the data center cooling system).
